whitecat.core.role.descriptors
Class EventDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  whitecat.core.role.descriptors.AbstractDescriptor
      whitecat.core.role.descriptors.EventDescriptor

public class EventDescriptor
extends AbstractDescriptor

A descriptor of an event. The event descriptor is described in the article Injecting roles in Java agents through runtime bytecode manipulation IBM SYSTEMS JOURNAL, VOL 44, NO 1, 2005 . The aim of an event descriptor is to describe an event that can be issued or received thru the execution of an operation. Even if this implementation is inspired by the above article, it presents a better modularity and organization of methods and properties, as well as the adoption of a collections instead of plain arrays.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net
